blogPost.excerpt: Explo lets you build customer-facing dashboards that fit seamlessly into your existing application. Connect directly to your database or warehouse, build custom-styled dashboards, and embed in your application within a day.
blogPost.body: Explo lets you build customer-facing dashboards that fit seamlessly into your existing application. Connect directly to your database or warehouse, build custom-styled dashboards, and embed in your application within a day.
blogPost.title: Explo 2.0 - Customer-facing dashboards and reports - lightning fast
blogPost.author: Gustaf Alströmer

localize.description: Explo可以让您建立面向客户的仪表盘，并无缝地嵌入到您现有的应用程序中。直接连接到您的数据库或仓库，建立自定义风格的仪表盘，并在一天内嵌入您的应用程序。
localize.tagline: 面向客户的仪表盘和报告--快如闪电。

localize.description: Explo可以讓您建立面向客戶的儀表盤，並無縫地嵌入到您現有的應用程序中。直接連接到您的數據庫或倉庫，建立自定義風格的儀表盤，並在一天內嵌入您的應用程序。
localize.tagline: 面向客戶的儀表盤和報告--快如閃電。

previous.excerpt: Keyword Staking is a term for committing your PRE tokens to a specific word or term. If you stake the most tokens to a given keyword, your ad will show up when someone searches for that term on Presearch - the decentralized search engine.
previous.title: Presearch - Keyword Staking - Keyword Advertising: A $100 billion dollar opportunity

localize.description: Keyword Staking是一个术语，用于将你的PRE代币承诺给一个特定的单词或术语。如果你将最多的代币押注到一个给定的关键词上，当有人在Presearch--去中心化的搜索引擎上搜索这个词时，你的广告就会显示出来。
localize.tagline: 关键字广告。千亿美元的机会

localize.description: Keyword Staking是一個術語，用於將你的PRE代幣承諾給一個特定的單詞或術語。如果你將最多的代幣押注到一個給定的關鍵詞上，當有人在Presearch--去中心化的搜索引擎上搜索這個詞時，你的廣告就會顯示出來。
localize.tagline: 關鍵字廣告。千億美元的機會

next.excerpt: Appect is a magical landing page builder for mobile app owners that converts store links into landing pages in a seconds. You can create unlimited landing pages by picking from our beautifully crafted themes, track visitors and downloads and collect feedback!
next.title: Appect - Turn your store link into a cool landing page in seconds

localize.description: Appect是一个神奇的登陆页面生成器，为移动应用程序所有者，在几秒钟内将商店链接转换为登陆页面。您可以从我们精美的主题中选择创建无限的着陆页，跟踪访问者和下载，并收集反馈意见!
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内将您的商店链接变成一个很酷的登陆页面。

localize.description: Appect是一個神奇的登陸頁面生成器，爲移動應用程序所有者，在幾秒鐘內將商店鏈接轉換爲登陸頁面。您可以從我們精美的主題中選擇創建無限的着陸頁，跟蹤訪問者和下載，並收集反饋意見!
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內將您的商店鏈接變成一個很酷的登陸頁面。
